name: Blender
description: This is an auto updating blender 2.79b install that fetches from builder.blender.org
notes: It sometimes takes a few minutes to start. DO NOT STOP THE APP, it's updating blender in the background.
content:
files:
- script: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/paperbenni/blender-update/master/2.79.sh
game:
  exe: $GAMEDIR/2.79.sh
installer:
- chmodx: script
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/2.79.sh
    src: script
